title: Port Macquarie Sharks
text:
The Port Macquarie Sharks are an Australian <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> football team based in <a href="Port%20Macquarie">Port Macquarie</a> and was formed in 1940.
Playing Record.
Playing record compiled from scores published in the <a href="Rugby%20League%20Week">Rugby League Week</a>.
